title: Augusta: Jedediah Hotchkiss to J. Taylor Ellyson, December 24, 1898
summary: Hotchkiss writes to thank his niece for gifts, mentions his health, tells her that he is beginning work on his memoirs, and supports her decision to join the United Daughters of the Confederacy.
keywords: Arts/Leisure, Death/Casualties, Family, Women, American Civil War
